sentence: Technology stocks remain sharply higher today, with shares of tech companies in the S&P 500 racing to a 2.1% advance.

In company news, International Business Machines Corp ( IBM ) by far remains today's best performer in the Dow Jones Industrial Average after the technology conglomerate today announced plans to acquire Bluewolf Group, a cloud consulting company and significant business partner of Salesforce.com ( CRM ).
Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
IBM said it expects to close on the deal before the end of the next quarter ending in June, subject to regulatory and other closing conditions.
Separately, analysts at Morgan Stanley today raised their price target for IBM shares by $28 to $168 a share, maintaining their Overweight investment rating.
IBM shares were up nearly 2% at $151.42 apiece, reaching a session high of $1153.10 a share earlier today.

(-) SUNE, Hedge fund manager David Tepper of Appaloosa Management reportedly files amended lawsuit seeking to have SUNE executives removed from TerraForm Power ( TERP ) management, according to Reuters.
